tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audience_data (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  interests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audience_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255),
age INT,
interests VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE video_recommendations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
video_id INT,
recommendation VARCHAR(255),
user_id INT)

CREATE TABLE AudienceData (
	user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	age INT,
	gender VARCHAR(10),
	interests VARCHAR[],
	location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE VideoRecommendations (
	video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR,
	rating FLOAT,
	category VARCHAR,
	length INT
);

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
	interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id UUID,
	video_id UUID,
	action VARCHAR,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audience_id INT,
    video_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(255),
   email VARCHAR(255),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE watch_history (
   watch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   video_id INT,
   watch_duration INT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE video_metadata (
   video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   video_title VARCHAR(255),
   duration INT,
   category VARCHAR(50),
   genre VARCHAR(50)
);
